test_message: Scan my last 10 emails and delegate any tasks found to my teammates. Notify the assigned teammates on Slack in the #slack-test channel.
expected_purpose: Orchestrate Email Scanner and Slack Notifier sub-agents to scan last 10 emails, extract tasks, and send Slack notifications

actual_response.summary: Scanned the last 10 Gmail emails, extracted delegatable tasks with assignees and priorities, and sent Slack notifications to assigned teammates in the #slack-test channel.
